title: Clean, Affordable & Great Location
text: I can't say enough how perfectly situated the hotel was. Right in the heart of Time Square/Theater District yet set back enough to provide quiet from the hustle and bustle. The room was clean had everything one would need & affordable. They even had a tasty continental breakfast. There was no view but then again the wall of the Bldg next door shielded the hotel from any possible time square noise. Highly recommended for a few night stay in the city!
